ygData.subject: Smiths of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: I saw the following site promoted on EQVault: http://home.earthlink.net/~sblack9/Blacksmiths.htm The author makes many good points about keeping costs in line
ygData.messageBody:
I saw the following site promoted on EQVault: http://home.earthlink.net/~sblack9/Blacksmiths.htm

The author makes many good points about keeping costs in line with the effort needed to attain the skill level. I remember an earlier attempt at a trade guild on E'ci that also promoted "price fixing" but eventually failed. This site at least allows you to "find" smiths on your server and place orders via email, so no more hunting around the various zones trying to drum up business.

What do you, as fellow smiths, think of the idea? If you aren't already on board, will you sign up?

This list has been dead too long, let's stir up some discussion!

Araman of E'ci
17th level Paladin
Skill 142 smith
